title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 99.9 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 99.9 - Waivers

State Regulations

For good cause shown to its satisfaction, the authority
may grant waivers to licensees adversely affected by this Part, under such
terms and conditions as the authority deems appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
99.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
